text:
Hi team,

I'm a bit stuck - working on an email template, which should include some personalisation tokens to custom properties in the portal. How do I know what the short code is for a property? (for example [product name])?

Thanks in advance for your help :slightly_smiling_face:

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/how-to-use-personalization-with-your-content>

<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-variables?_ga=2.44156588.966430697.1578941440-597792729.1559921745>

Here are a couple of resources you should check out!
